website_summaries.verdict: This exclusively-made for women Keen Elsa III Sneaker has a sporty vibe that captivated many shoppers. The retro-looking and casual vibe of the low-top is combined with neutral colorways, characteristics that allow versatility.Comfortable as any Keen lifestyle shoe could be, it could be a top choice when going on trips or simply while doing strolls around the city.
pros: For a large percentage of users, the wide toe box is a pleasant surprise
A number of shoppers attest that the Keen Elsa III is comfortable
The color options of the 3rd edition of the Keen Elsa Sneaker has been adored by several wearers
Some commenters have stated that no break-in period should be expected
As per a shopper, custom insoles are not going to be necessary, even when it is used for long distances
The low-top has been a delight for a user because it does not put pressure on the tip of her foot
cons: A few of the wearers are not fans of the Keen Elsa III Sneaker’s arch support
The white overlay on the toe box has been criticized by a couple of commenters who think its inclusion in the design is a mistake

customer_reviews.title: A Wider Converse All Star Alternative
customer_reviews.text: I love my Converse All Stars, but their narrow toe box started to bother me. I saw these shoes by Keen and though I'd give them a shot. The toe box is definitely wider and more comfortable than my All Stars. The only issue I had with these was their insole which had a huge heel-to-toe drop. Fortunately, the insole is removable, and I'm perfectly comfortable without it. Without the insoles, these shoes feel just like my All Stars, but with a wider toe box for my toes to have some wiggle room!
customer_reviews.author: Khumbu77

customer_reviews.title: There are no arch support in these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love Keen branded shoes, I own many pairs. I was disappointed to receive these today and there are no arch support. Yes I can buy new inserts, but for $80, these should have had arch supports. The plus side is that the shoe looks great, fits great and they did put a nice padding on the back of the heel (where many shoes like this rub). Haven't decided if I am going to keep them yet, $80 is a lot of money to spend on shoes with no arch supports.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: slightly disappointed...
customer_reviews.text: Have worn KEEN for years - several different styles - and always liked them. These run slightly big - and wide - I originally intended to wear without socks, but, almost have to wear with something. The heel sort of bothers me, but, may eventually be alright. The arch support is better than most shoes this style, and I do like the look. I changed the lacing only because I needed to tighten them more easily. (lacing is VERY long) Again, not a bad shoe, just not really what I was expecting from KEEN.
customer_reviews.author: tjs

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, super comfy, and good support
customer_reviews.text: I love my new Keens. They are cute and fit well. I was a little worried that there wasn't going to be enough arch support, but there seems to be the right amount. I am looking forward to wearing them on an upcoming trip to NYC, but right now I have been wearing them to work (I'm a teacher) to break them in. So far so good. No blisters, no pain. They fit just right.
customer_reviews.author: Beth M. Sherwood

customer_reviews.title: Fit well, comfy
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are comfortable but if you like your stripes and plaids to match you may not be happy with the shoes. The ones I was sent have one shoe toe with the light plaid and the other with the darkest part of the plaid pattern. Some may feel that effect is unique.
customer_reviews.author: TCD

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love my Keens. This is my 5th pair. These are cute, so comfortable, and I have arthritis in my knees and hips so that is important. Way more comfortable than Converse and easier stride in the Keeks. Love that the color is actually off white and heathered, not glowing bright white. The fit is perfect for me. My normal size is a 10 and these fit perfectly in length, width and toe box. Thanks Keen! I love your shoes!
customer_reviews.author: moo2

customer_reviews.title: Cute!  But, don’t wear for an 8 hour walking tour!
customer_reviews.text: I like the appearance of this shoe. Cute! For myself, these will be good for shorter wear as there is no arch support, but, adequate cushioning over a hard rubber sole. Very well made with materials that appear will wear well.
customer_reviews.author: SJD

customer_reviews.title: Changes to design lack quality
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of this style and I'm greatly disappointed by the changes. The material is way flimsier. I'll be lucky if they last 6 months as my every day shoes. The fit is still wide but the toe is so much more pointed. I went up in size from 91/2 to 10 but it feels more like an 11 with how much room is in the toe. The white rubber toe is also very flimsy and is more decorative than practical. Over all just not worth the money. I might as well just buy converse with how they fit.
customer_reviews.author: DodiRose

customer_reviews.title: Good quality brand
customer_reviews.text: I bought Keen sandals, And now i bought Keen sneakers. I like the shoes, good quality, comfortable for walking and very nice wide shoes. I ordered half size bigger and it perfectly fits if i wear socks.
customer_reviews.author: Thinne

customer_reviews.title: Really Love These Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I love this style of shoe. The color, material, especially if one is Vegan, makes them very sturdy and they go with everything I wear. I dress very casual, preferring tactical/cargo-style pants. They went well with my scrubs I wear for work, and boy, are they ever comfortable! Even after pulling a long shift on my feet. There isn't much arch support, but that isn't affecting the high arch I have. And, I've always been a fan of the Keen brand. These shoes really delivered for me, that I'm planning on buying another pair for next summer. I wear these almost every day so I know they'll be worn through by then.
customer_reviews.author: USAF Veteran

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I was looking for. The arch support is exactly where it should be. Ive got flat feet and love the sandals I have from Keen. Nice and firm but not too firm. I’m going to spray water proofing on them for work cause they’re obviously not water resistant which I need for wet grass and playing with kids.
customer_reviews.author: Kylie

customer_reviews.title: Keen Black and Grey Plaid are stylish and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. They are so cute with the grey and black plaid and all the comfort and support you expect from Keen. Wore these daily on vacation last week, no complaints. I would Absolutely recommend Keen.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn A.

customer_reviews.title: Very cute, great look, great fit
customer_reviews.text: Saw these shoes on another person and recognized the “round toe box”. I like wide toe box shoes, they just feel better even though I don’t have a wide foot really. I ordered them after asking her a few questions. She said they may feel slightly tight at first but keep wearing them and they will soon be one of your favorite shoes. She was SO right!! She is a hairdresser and on her feet all day. I love them and will be getting another color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super sneakers
customer_reviews.text: These are my second pair of Keen sneakers. I love these shoes for everyday walk-about shoes. They are comfortable with great support for feet and a funky stylish look. The are very durable under normal wear. I was pleased to find longer laces than on my previous pair. I chose a red plaid to make a statement while walking my Scottish terrier girl in her plaid jumpers. Give these shoes five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Glave

customer_reviews.title: Love my Keen Sneakers!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE my Keen Sneakers!! They are super cute, comfy and well made!! I have two pairs in size 7.5, which is my normal shoe size, and they fit perfect. I'll probably get a third pair, since there are so many cute color choices available. A little pricey, but they're worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Keen needs to fix sizing issues
customer_reviews.text: Good- color, arch support better than Converse but not as good as normal Keens, comfortable, cute. Bad- this is 4th pair. 1st were slightly too short, 2nd way too big, 3rd just right, 4th slightly too big. I have purchased lots of Keens and these are the only shoes I've had this issue with.
customer_reviews.author: LuLu

customer_reviews.title: sneakers kind of feel like they could be worn on either foot (?!)
customer_reviews.text: These are cute-as-a -button sneakers. But they really don't have a foot shape that conforms to a left and right foot. Consequently the big toe on both feet feel a little squished in. There is a tiny bit of foot bed support, but it's hard to appreciate it because the my foot doesn't really sit on the bed as it should. So- I will wear them out to get groceries, or to the movies, but definitely not all day, or for lots of walking or standing.
customer_reviews.author: dawn

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and made well
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing Keen sneakers for several years now-just love them. They are cute, stylish and last forever. I’m a 69 year old grandmother with 10 grandkids, and people say my sneakers are “cool”. This print is fun! Fast shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute, comfy, but a little too small
customer_reviews.text: This shoe runs small. 8.5 or 39 is my normal size and usually has extra room in the toe. The shape of the toebox puts pressure on the big toe. (My big toe is the longest, but not by much.) Cool shoe other than that. I suggest ordering a half size up. The extra cushion in the back of the heel is a welcome addition in this iteration of the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: CanD

customer_reviews.title: Much lower quality than older versions
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been buying keen sneakers for years, and this most recent iteration is not great, especially comparatively to the quality they used to be. They feel super thin and stiff. The new cushion on the heel is nice, but they removed all the cushion around the rest of the ankle, so now it’s just the sharp canvas edge. Also, there is minimal support in the footbed, much less than the previous generation. They also only gave one color of shoelace, instead of giving a grey/white option as well. I have to switch sneaker brands now. :(
customer_reviews.author: Kandice

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: They fit very well, especially for my toes. When I first wore them, they felt like I was flat footed because my other sneakers have thicker padding & soles & I thought I might need an insert because I have plantar fasciitis but they are doing fine. I love the extra space for my toes. They feel fine for my 1 mile walks.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy J

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I ended up returning these. They weren't very comfortable. They were tight on my toes even though they were the right size. Little arch support. I also didn't like that the laces are the same color as the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: T Roth

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these as a gift for my mother. They are really high quality and have great arch support. She does have bunions and states the toe box isn’t as wide as other Keen styles, but she still really loves them. They’re not really red, but more of a burgundy color. The waffle stitching is a really cute added touch
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: In love with these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these shoes. They are extremely comfortable and I am picky because I have arthritis in my feet. I have always loved the look of Converse but could never wear them because the toes are too narrow. These have a roomy toe box and a very comfortable sole.
customer_reviews.author: ann sampson

customer_reviews.title: Great Kicks
customer_reviews.text: I wear Keen’s for my work, I am on my feet 8 hours a day 5 days a week. The hiking style are my go to for this. However I wanted a relaxed style for days off and found these old style canvas (like when I was a kid). Being Keen’s I was hoping they would be just as comfortable. Wow they fit my wants and needs.
customer_reviews.author: Glowing from inside out

customer_reviews.title: No more grommets on the side means hot feet
customer_reviews.text: I have a pair of green quilted Elsa II sneakers that I very much enjoy wearing. I bought the Elsa III in blue without noticing that there are no grommets on the side of the shoe. I wore them to work and by the end of my shift, my feet were hot! They still have the comfort I expect and enjoy from Keen, but I hope they bring back those little vent holes!
customer_reviews.author: L. Putnam

customer_reviews.title: Great Choice
customer_reviews.text: I would have given a 5, but the 4 is because they aren't perfect. These shoes are a great choice for everyday wear. I wore them right out of the box on a flight and then did some bicycling and a lot of walking on the trip. They look good and were appropriate for all of my get-a-way activities. Not perfect because there is little to no arch support and they are a bit heavy. I am generally a size 10 but often go with a 10.5 for comfort. I chose the size 10 and they comfortable, roomy and fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Norfolk

customer_reviews.title: White not white but cream
customer_reviews.text: Returning. “White” is actually cream, which is not what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: SL22

customer_reviews.title: Great fit & Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these shoes. They are comfortable and fit just as expected. I am on my feet over 8 hours a day, and by the end of the day these still feel good. The forefront is wide enough to accommodate my chubby foot! ❤️ Highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: holtster

customer_reviews.title: Great every day shoe
customer_reviews.text: I had two pairs of the previous shoe and for this one I had to go down half a size. I love this shoe just as much as the previous two pair once I found the right size. They have cured the plantar fasciitis in my foot better than the super expensive shoes suggested by my doctor.
customer_reviews.author: Chemmom

customer_reviews.title: I’ve had lots of compliments from other women on these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These cute, colorful shoes fit right out of the box. I received them the day before embarking on a three week tour which was heavy with exercise and activity. Lots of cobble stone streets and LOTS of steps! I have many Keen shoes and have loved every pair. These aren’t as structured as some, but kept the bottom of my feet safe from rocks jutting up etc. I have wide feet and short toes. The style of the the lace up adds to the comfort...tighten when needed, loosen when your feet swell! Love the shoes!
customer_reviews.author: dennis mikel

customer_reviews.title: Cute but NOT comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I loved these but they didn't work for me. Too big especially in the toe box. They did not have as much support in the arch as most Keens. They also were very stiff and flat feeling.
customer_reviews.author: tab

customer_reviews.title: not very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I really want these shoes to work but the sizing is weird and after wearing them for one day as a teacher my right foot hurt. I looked at the sizing and they seem to be the same size (and my feet are both the exact same size) but for some reason only my right foot was uncomfortable. Sadly, I am noticing that the quality and sizing of keen shoes has been going downhill a bit. I will probably still wear them anyway because I need them right now.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable...will be good for fall
customer_reviews.text: First off...these are NOT white but more a CREAM colored with a white band across the toe box. I decided to keep them as they will work well into fall fashion with some light colored cords and a sweater. The toe box is roomy which I prefer. Size was the same as other Keen's I have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Dana FNP

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for everyday wear
customer_reviews.text: I love wearing these Keen's. The wide toe area is especially comfortable and they have decently comfortable insoles. I'm a big fan of the green color, though plan to buy a second pair in another color, too.
customer_reviews.author: MsAquamarine

customer_reviews.title: Great Sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Love these sneakers! They are true to size and very comfortable. They have nice cushioned soles which make them great for walking. I wore them all day long the day they arrived and had no sore feet! Great pair of sneakers. I am never disappointed with Keen products.
customer_reviews.author: Sewblessed27

customer_reviews.title: Very flat, lacking support
customer_reviews.text: Wider and shorter than usual Keen shoes for the size purchased. Tried inserting ergonomic Keen-specific footbeds & they didn't help. Textile appears to not be sturdy enough to hold up for long- had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: M. P.

customer_reviews.title: Good fit. Comfy.
customer_reviews.text: I like them - I have done a lot of walking right out of the box and they did their job!! I have hard to fit feet and keen hits a home run every time.
customer_reviews.author: Randee

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Good cushion and pretty. I was going to return because of the wrinkle on top of left shoe. But neverthless, good shoe to have
customer_reviews.author: red

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfy and Stylish
customer_reviews.text: Love the quilting. It makes it stand out from other tennis shoes. I have already gotten compliments on it. The shoes are generous around the toes, adding to the comfort. They're so comfy that I bought another style of the same brand.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Silva

customer_reviews.title: Great support
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter. Her job requires long hours standing on a concrete floor. She said that the shoes have good support and her feet don’t hurt after work. She also likes the sporty look.
customer_reviews.author: thm

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute and comfy! Keen has always been my favorite wide shoe go-to company. I just might have to get another pair in another color...
customer_reviews.author: N1220

customer_reviews.title: Keen does it again - COMFORT!
customer_reviews.text: As usual Keen does it again with comfy sneakers. I’ve owned 4 all similar styles and has never failed me! Great arch support!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Cushioned but zero support for heel and arch
customer_reviews.text: I don’t understand why such a quality shoe lacks one simple feature...support. It’s cushioned, but without heel or arch support. Ridiculous. If this shoe had support I would buy them in every color.
customer_reviews.author: LA Plunk

customer_reviews.title: great quality
customer_reviews.text: so comfortable.. i can wear them all day and my feet never hurt.. so cute just as I wanted this color
customer_reviews.author: mesa

customer_reviews.title: Small not wide
customer_reviews.text: These are listed under wide toe box and are just barely wider than normal and run 1/2 to 1 size small
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie H

customer_reviews.title: Keens
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoe! So Comfy! My only word of advice is that they run a little large. I have wide feet and these are even slightly big on me. Size down 1/2 a size
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Roth

customer_reviews.title: Made well, runs large, returned.
customer_reviews.text: Run large, felt clumsy, returned and did not attempt to order half size up, thought it made need whole size.....
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: I love Keens! Quality, comfortable, supportive all in a cute shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I disliked the fact that they sent me the wrong color. I ordered a black pair w/a quilted type pattern & a white sole. At least they sent me the right box. But the shoe inside the box was a multi colored plaid flannel. Cute, but not what I ordered and paid for. Exchanging
customer_reviews.author: T-Ray

customer_reviews.title: Color is off. Not white
customer_reviews.text: Shows were not comfortable as my other keen shoes. And.......the white is actually beige. Returned them.
customer_reviews.author: MadeleineK

customer_reviews.title: Just what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are very comfortable. My only complaint is that they do not have any arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Marta

customer_reviews.title: An Absolute Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a shoe that had this style and was trying different brands to get "the look". Well, after trying several and hating them I went to my favorite brand for hiking shoes and boots and found these. They are unbelievably great and so comfortable. They are made really well so they will last a good while too. The are adorable and my new favorite shoe - Absolutely great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jcooper

customer_reviews.title: Toe Room
customer_reviews.text: Pros: wide toe box for comfort: stylish Cons: uncomfortable footbed I replaced the insole with my own, so I’m happy with these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy S. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Cute and supportive summer sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy canvas sneaker. Supportive. Super cute. I need to wear my no-show socks for perfect fit. Plenty of extra space in toes so you might want to size down.
customer_reviews.author: E. Kehoe

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I own them in four colors now. They hold up well, the notice is good, and they are so comfortable. I am a teacher and on my feet all day. These are a fun way to be comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hrncir

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, great insole!
customer_reviews.text: The product was exactly represented. Color and descriptions are spot on. The insole is amazing and very thick. So thick my foot, in a heavyweight sock, felt tight. The insole molds after time and I started with thin socks to break them in. Padding by the ankle rocks! Love these shoes and have another pair heading my way soon!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: shoes
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable fit all around . It was a present for my wife and she loves those shoes . Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Bernd Meier

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe needs more arch support
customer_reviews.text: Love the print of the shoe. Only issue I have is the arch support if wearing for long periods of time. I was expecting all keen shoes to have same arch support as the women’s keen presidio shoe
customer_reviews.author: L. G. Weston

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy and cool.
customer_reviews.text: so comfortable!! And they breathe nicely. Perfect fit, wide enough to be comfortable without being loose.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Lazo-Herencia

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these shoes! They’re cute, comfy and I wear them all the time. I’ll be ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: must buy
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe! Highly recommended even for long periods on your feet.
customer_reviews.author: kelly

customer_reviews.title: Quality and comfort
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfect, comfortable, and quality construction. This is my 3rd pair, love them!
customer_reviews.author: M Fischer

customer_reviews.title: New favorite shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable, sturdy and fun to wear. I love these happy shoes!!
customer_reviews.author: Catar L.

customer_reviews.title: Great Casual Sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Great casual sneaker. Very comfortable. No break in period - I walked several miles the first time I wore them with no problem. Only surprising thing is that the sole is a little slippery in the rain.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Bean

customer_reviews.title: Keen does it again!!!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike..from box...to feet...to street. Love Keen's wider toe bed, did need to add an insole insert. Will continue to purchase Keens.
customer_reviews.author: Wonderlust

customer_reviews.title: Just didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Great quality as always, but the way they fit didn't work for my feet. The return was super easy.
customer_reviews.author: willowraven13

customer_reviews.title: Enjoy this mess shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes, washes very well in our washer too.
customer_reviews.author: A.A. Summers

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Just what I expected! Cute, comfy... Keen... I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Teri Border

customer_reviews.title: Great addition of the heel cushion!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute. Well made. Love the enhancement of the new cushion at the heel. Definite improvement! These are comfy and adorable.
customer_reviews.author: ldw

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes. True to size. I really like them and will order more colors.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Not up to keen quality.
customer_reviews.text: They look nice but are of a poor quality for support and wear. The fabric does not breath and made my feet and prescription orthotic damp and smelly. Ugh.
customer_reviews.author: Tammie Young

customer_reviews.title: My favorite shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Best shoe ever. I have two pair. The shoes are comfort, offer stability and a fun style. I’ve always wanted this style shoes but never found a comfortable pair, until now!
customer_reviews.author: Sam T.

customer_reviews.title: Love love love!
customer_reviews.text: I love these!!! Very comfortable! Great quality and have received many compliments! True to size! Will order more!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly N Hayford

customer_reviews.title: Another GREAT purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: Second pair, and these are as CUTE as the first!!! Love, love, love the comfort factor...wide toe box, cushy heel guard, and removable insole so I can use my custom inserts. This gal is HAPPY, once again, thanks to Keen!!! ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Tunnell

customer_reviews.title: KEEN Sneakers are superb right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: i bought these to walk all over Lisbon Portugal, on the steeeeep, slippery, uneven tile and cobblestone streets. And on the long plane trips. Superbly comfortable in both instances.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Ourada

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: This company makes the best shoes for wide feet. And so adorable. Super comfy too!
customer_reviews.author: Nylestod-01

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy worth the money already own 2 pairs great shoe
customer_reviews.author: HoTT Stuff !

customer_reviews.title: Love Red
customer_reviews.text: I have many different colors but needed Red for Friday as it is Wear Red on Friday to Supportour Troops
customer_reviews.author: EMILY G RUNDELL

customer_reviews.title: Great style! Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Loved these shoes. Plan on getting more in different colors!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes
customer_reviews.text: This are wonderful shoes and fit great. They are so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: The fabric is light and soft!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. They felt great right from the start. I tried another brand that looked like these but they were so stiff that they rubbed my heel raw. Great shoes! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: cynthia j watson

customer_reviews.title: Keens are worth the extra expense.
customer_reviews.text: I have had surgery on my ankle and a lot of shoes hurt my feet. Keens are fantastic and are worth the money fir my feet.
customer_reviews.author: marcia sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoes worth the money
customer_reviews.text: My wife really likes these shoes. She usually buy's cheap shoes so I got these for her for Christmas and they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Javin

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: These are good for wide widths and have great support!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Received these shoes about 2 weeks ago and I have worn them several times. They are very comfortable. I like the color and the diamond stitch. They are very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Nice, wide toe box
customer_reviews.text: I love these sneakers and bought them in other colors too!
customer_reviews.author: Carol R. Perry

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers are so cute. But they are uncomfortable for me. To flat and to hard for a lot of walking. So I bought some orthopedic insole. Hope they help. I don't want to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Pacheco Wood

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: No break in period fit was comfortable from the start. I didnt care for the ratio of the white toe in contrast to the rest of the shoe, but this is more of my personal taste. Still kept them...
customer_reviews.author: MrsNWT

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable. Plenty of cushion. Perfect for just every day walking about.
customer_reviews.author: cynthia magoon

customer_reviews.title: Quality is rapidly decreasing
customer_reviews.text: The first pair of Keen tennies I purchased lasted four years. The second pair I wore for two years. This third pair, I purchased five months ago and the fabric is splitting in multiple places. Pretty disappointed in their quality.
customer_reviews.author: Isabelle Blakeslee

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I have never been able to wear flat shoes until these. So comfortable, and cute too!
customer_reviews.author: Dbaxfan

customer_reviews.title: Ordered 1/2 size up
customer_reviews.text: Love these keen always has more room in the toe box,
customer_reviews.author: Marcia C.

customer_reviews.title: Keen shoes are my favorite brand!
customer_reviews.text: You can never go wrong with Keen shoes. I've never had a pair I didn't just love. The looks and the comfort are never surpassed.
customer_reviews.author: Louise N. Parker

customer_reviews.title: A great looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: True to fit. Very pretty. Looks great with a shorter pant. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love Keen shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Keen shoes always fit me perfectly. It’s the one brand that I can order online and never worry about them not fitting. Order my regular size..when they arrive I can take outa the box and wear with no problem. Love them!!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: The shoe was cute but not cutesy and felt very comfortable. It either ran a little small or my feet are bigger than I'd like to believe. Am returning for a half size bigger because love the look.
customer_reviews.author: Deann

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, perfect fit. If you haven't had Keen sneakers know they are heavier than most sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Rudnick

customer_reviews.title: Wide toe bed!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes have a wide toe bed that works for me and the bunion on my left foot. I , too switched out the laces for white to give them a more youthful look. I've wearing them to break them in for my trip. Will be doing lots of walking. So happy to have found them!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Love my Keens
customer_reviews.text: Also have Elsa and love both! These fit a bit nicer around toes. :)
customer_reviews.author: BonnieBee

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I'm 71 & get a lot of compliments on my cute shoes. These shoes are not just for young people! They are comfortable all day long.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Brown

product_meta.title: KEEN Women's Brown Plaid Climbing Low-Top Sneakers
product_meta.description: Our bestselling, packable, do-everything sneaker got a comfy, stylish update. With our cushioned KEEN Luftcell PU insole and an athletic fit, plus a cushioned heel panel, you can explore even farther.
